t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand
s: We created the IP Accelerator program with small and medium businesses in mind. Get help registering your trademark, or work with a service provider to file a copyright or patent application, research potential brand names, or manage an IP dispute.

t: 4 insights from Amazon’s latest Brand Protection Report
s: April 4, 2023 - Our third annual report shows Amazon’s continued progress toward driving counterfeit to zero—both in our store and across the retail industry.

t: Calzedonia launched swimwear collection on Amazon just in time for summer | Fox News
s: 6 days ago - Calzedonia just launched a swimwear collection on Amazon featuring unique, colorful one-pieces, bikinis and cover-ups that are great for the beach or pool.
